sub_title: Head of Spain & MENA at ENERTRAG | Renewables & Green Hydrogen | Project Development & Investment
summary: Leading the growth of ENERTRAG‘s renewable energy and green hydrogen business in Spain, the Middle East, and Northern Africa. Former Principal and Senior Manager at BCG. 10+ years of experience in the energy sector focusing on the energy transition, renewables, and green hydrogen.
